scholarships.name: Global Korea Scholarship (GKS)
scholarships.description: Full scholarship for international students to pursue undergraduate or graduate studies in Korea.
scholarships.eligibility: Thai citizens under 25 (undergraduate) or 40 (graduate) years old

scholarships.name: Korea Foundation for Advanced Studies (KFAS)
scholarships.description: Scholarship for outstanding international students pursuing graduate degrees.
scholarships.eligibility: Master's or PhD applicants with excellent academic records

scholarships.name: Seoul National University Scholarship
scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship for international graduate students at SNU.
scholarships.eligibility: Admitted graduate students with high GPA

scholarships.name: POSCO Asia Fellowship
scholarships.description: Fellowship for Asian students pursuing graduate studies in Korea.

scholarships.name: KAIST International Student Scholarship
scholarships.provider: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
scholarships.description: Full scholarship for outstanding students in science and engineering fields.
scholarships.eligibility: Students with strong background in STEM fields

scholarships.name: Korea University Global Leader Scholarship
scholarships.description: Scholarship for international students showing leadership potential.
scholarships.eligibility: Students with leadership experience and good academic standing

scholarships.name: Yonsei University International Scholarship
scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship for talented international students.
scholarships.eligibility: High-achieving students with excellent academic records

scholarships.name: Samsung Global Scholarship
scholarships.description: Corporate scholarship for students in business and technology fields.
scholarships.eligibility: Graduate students in business, engineering, or technology
